message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to work with you. As a starting point, we're willing to offer you the product for $1200000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $950000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering our pricing strategy, we're willing to meet you halfway. We're proposing a price of $1100000 for the product. We believe this is a fair compromise considering the value it brings to your business.
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I understand your position and appreciate the effort to reach a compromise. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $1050000 for the product.
